data.description:
Wrap yourself in 5 tons of metal and go smashing through a dark scene of UNDERGROUND MECH FIGHTS!

Bash, crush, maul and rip apart enemy bots and mechs - it’s full-on metal-on-metal violence in this first of its kind physics-based mech brawler.

But rampaging through the pits ain’t all - this is a Roguelike. 
Gear up with 100+ items and power tools, hire hackers and saboteurs, hustle and deal with the gangsters and psychos who run these streets as you claw your way up the food chain.

This city is a dog-eat-dog s#@^ show, but luckily you ain't alone.
Your little bruv King is in your corner - hacking your enemies and giving you lip while you fight like a wild animal, smashing car sized pit bots that wanna kill you dead to the deafening roars of the blood thirsty crowds.

This is New Brakka - The Mech Fighting Capital of the World.
This is UNDERDOGS.

changelog.change_log:
UPDATE 1.0.3 IS OUT

In this minor update, we fixed a few bugs and added a Run Summary window that opens after YOU DED which includes day reached, cause of death, most prominent characters and new unlocks:

Additionally:
Fixed Tight Build Quirk box
Fixed Self Caring Quirk box
Fixed some performance leaks with particle systems
Fixed some sounds not stopping
Fixed some missing damage VFX to Nailguns
Fixed a few performance hiccups in ACT III on Quest 3

update 1.0.2 is out! 

Here are some highlights:
Middle Finger - Enabled
New Bashguard models for the Stun, Blast, Power and Kinoflectic bashguards
New art assets, including new illustrations of Bulfas and Nait, a new mech starting-up SFX the players after calibrating
Improved Jab Detection
Quitting in mid-combat saves your HP and partial progress
Added new SteamVR bindings for binding locomotion and effector action
A shitton of small bug-fixes, as well as some rare critical bugs

You can find the complete changelog & our just-released ROADMAP in the new NEWS FEED within the game!

FUN
Jungledogs heads now have updated model

BUG FIXES
Overheat status can carry between fights, causing PWR 0% to show in Garage
Corruption in save files can happen when starting a new run from Hangar
Roaches breakdance and glitch all over the arena
Minor bugfixes to encounters

BALANCING
Repair Kits heal less
Tweaks to REPAIR encounters balance
Difficulty level tweaks for first runs in Career
